name: Chandrakant Gopalan
body:
### Work

* [Github Repos (Public)](https://github.com/cgopalan)
* [Bitbucket Repos (Private)](https://bitbucket.org/cgopalan)

I use the bitbucket repos to host code for solutions to the online courses, so they are protected. If you need access, send me a request and I will give you an invitation at my discretion.

### Blog

* [Third Impressions](http://cgopalan.tumblr.com/)
* [Always learning](http://programmingnirvana.blogspot.com/)

### Online (MOOC) courses completed

* [Artificial Intelligence Class (Stanford/Udacity)](https://github.com/cgopalan/cgopalan.github.io/blob/master/pdfs/AI_cert.pdf)
* [Machine Learning Class (Stanford/Coursera)](https://github.com/cgopalan/cgopalan.github.io/blob/master/pdfs/ML_cert.pdf)
* [Algorithms (Stanford/Coursera)](https://github.com/cgopalan/cgopalan.github.io/blob/master/pdfs/Algorithms_cert.pdf)
* [Foundations of Computer Graphics (EdX)](https://github.com/cgopalan/cgopalan.github.io/blob/master/pdfs/FCG_cert.pdf)

### Other contributions

Recently I have started contributing to the Postgres guide. 

* [Arrays](http://postgresguide.com/sexy/arrays.html)
* [Enumerated Data Types](http://www.postgresguide.com/sexy/enums.html)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
